computer.notes: The tour of Tuscany consists of 4 days visiting Firenze, Pisa, and Milano for $990.00 per person
The Best of Italy tour consist of sing everything possible across 12 days at the cost of $2100.00 per person
The tour of Historic Places throughout Italy consists of visiting Pompeii, Roma, and Napoli for $1760.00 per person
The Art Tour of Italy visits all the art museum in Firenze, Venezia, and Roma for $1450.00 per person
